post.body: no way! after all that, :o be dark by the time you get down there now, lol
hahaha, no that can be an option mate, as long as someone takes the pics, this could be the next level in marketing, haha
Hahaha, who are you flying with? I know I wouldn't want to be sat on a runway waiting around this time of the mornin' :p
Morning Shaq, (well it is where I am anyway, hehe) :)
lol, i don't think there will be a storm so you should be ok. can't you charge your phone up on the plane?
Nice :p Southampton isn't the best of places, heh. What's the reason for delay? We've got quite a bit of fog down here (Taunton)
that doesn't surprise me, heh. are you going anywhere nice? :)
oh ok, well not long til ya finish work now ;)
ooooh i see, why do you want to cry? coz your lonely? i get lonely quite easily, i'm recently single again now as well, lol
huh? you can't cry for 2 hours? what's up?
sounds kewl :) (literally, kewl - lol) :D
ahh i see. what do you teach? :)
blimey :o i would love to go over to new york at xmas, i hear its pretty spectacular, the uk is awful, lol
haha, i'm almost tempted to get a pic of me and make myself an xmas hat seeing everyone else is doing so, hehe
good luck with the shopping, is it likely to be really busy where you are?it's quite cold here in the uk altho no ice this am
haha ok sexy. a gift from photoshop was it? :p
your safe, i got bored with the game after a few goes, lol
sure thing mate, the last thing i need is to get addicted to another game though... so be warned ;) :p hehe
haha, that was saturday night wasn't it? we stayed in then, my date was cooking for us... and yes i was twittering you :/ lol
lol, no... this was in my car... i wasn't hanging around :/ a plane might be the better option next time though... heh
yeh had a hectic day in bristol, we all went go-carting and went for a meal, then i had a date that night in plymouth, heh :)
hehehe, it's a bit of a mission although i did bristol to plymouth in 1hr 35mins on friday night :/
Morning matey, i've been in Plymouth all weekend with a new lady i'm seeing :D hehe (sorry, news wasn't seo related, lol :p)
i'm off out in a min mate so you enjoy the rest of your weekend and i shall speak to you on monday no doubt :)
hehe, i'm only messing mate, i never really have got on with bitter, heh
haha, it's law for the 50+ :p ;) i'm drinking red wine at the moment though :/ hehe
yuk @ bitter, lol
yeeeh no problem, who needs sleep anyway ;) early night tonight then is it? hehe
you should be right as rain with 10hrs sleep in 48 hrs ;) well i hope you continue recovering back to normal :)
you feeling better now yeah?
Have you changed your internet browser from Internet Explorer? I would recommend doing so due to the latest security flaw!
Best way to promote a Facebook page? Wondering how I can target the right audience... Any ideas? :)

well there a southwest company so can't expect much more really, lol. it's poor that you can't get off though until it's ready to depart :(
Finally got a fix for Call Of Duty 5 - World at War - Can start playing it now, haha :p - I'm going to do bugger all at work today, lol
Blitzing my pc at the moment, numerous windows profiles results in numerous viruses and trojans in other peoples mailbox... mem lag :/
Morning all, how are we all today? Looking forward to Christmas? :)
Morning all, we are all going go-carting in avonmouth today :) Should be entertaining, haha
Hello all, I'm having an unproductive day so far, heh
